 Thursday, December 23, 2010, 4:18 PM 





=C2=A0 


=C2=A0Yeah, been told=
 this. I get the impression there's some joining this group hoping to get t=
heir ghost huntng or spirit beliefs validated, or confirmed, when they hear=
 this junk they bail. This stuff is ITC, Instrumental Trans-Communication. =
That can be audio, video, or still images. I think there is a mis-conceptio=
n in the paranormal whatever world that EVP is ghost voice, weak whispery b=
arely audible noise, and ITC is video feedback loop images, an never shall =
the two ever, ever mix. Some seem to think it's all perfectly well defined =
and laid down in laws and protocols. Afterall it's repeated on TV week afte=
r weak after week.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I managed to completely offend the guy that=
 told me about the embedded images, Richard Roberts. He started laying down=
 all these absolute undeniabel laws and definitions of EVP, and when I disa=
greed openly, he got all pissed off, deleted all his Facebook content, and =
went away, sulking in some dark internet corner I guess. I feel bad about o=
ffending him, but come on! Grow up out there. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Think I'll repl=
ace the tuner in this box, too frikin' noisy. I don't have tuners to spare,=
 but this one is unacceptabel. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S
